name: Lost Hope
description:
Open world, survival and adventure in one!

Start the game with nothing and gradually acquire better equipment that will help you survive and discover new areas. Each area has its own climate, vegetation and animals, as well as challenges and dangers.

Create, destroy and shape the world according to your own will. Your actions have an impact on the environment, which reacts to you and changes over time. Engage in farming, mining and resource gathering to survive in this captivating reality. Use your knowledge to create useful tools and items.

Explore vast landscapes full of wonders and dangers, discovering secrets hidden on various territories. Take on various tasks that affect the story and the world of the game. Find out what happened to humanity and how to find hope in this lost world.

Fight hunger, thirst and extreme environmental conditions, affecting your character, adding realism to the experience. You have to take care of your physical and mental needs, not to go crazy. Lead a strategic fight with dangerous zombies and an enemy faction, to survive and succeed in this world. Use melee or firearms to defend yourself and attack.

Easily traverse the terrain, using various vehicles for exploration, survival and conquest. Modify your weapons and vehicles, adapting them to your style, increasing your chances of survival in this unpredictable world.
